text: @glennkirschner2 It causes heart stoppage. Eq. Our daughter has heart murmur and was advised that taking hydroxychlo when travelling to malaria regions was too dangerous. It’s stupid to take it if you don’t need to or have risk factors, like morbid obesity (trump). https://t.co/hWfN67j63O

domain.name: Person
